pivot.serialization
Interface Serializer

All Known Implementing Classes:
BinarySerializer, BufferedImageSerializer, CSVSerializer, JSONSerializer, PropertiesSerializer, WTKXSerializer
public interface Serializer

Defines an interface for writing objects to and reading objects from a data stream.

Author:
gbrown

Method Summary
 java.lang.String getMIMEType()
          Returns the MIME type of the data read and written by this serializer.
 java.lang.Object readObject(java.io.InputStream inputStream)
          Deserializes an object from an input stream.
 void writeObject(java.lang.Object object, java.io.OutputStream outputStream)
          Serializes an object to an output stream.
 

Method Detail

readObject

                            throws java.io.IOException,
                                   SerializationException
Deserializes an object from an input stream.

Parameters:
inputStream - The data stream from which the object will be read.
Returns:
The deserialized object.
Throws:
java.io.IOException
SerializationException

writeObject

void writeObject(java.lang.Object object,
                 java.io.OutputStream outputStream)
                 throws java.io.IOException,
                        SerializationException
Serializes an object to an output stream.

Parameters:
object - The object to serialize.
outputStream - The data stream to which the object will be written.
Throws:
java.io.IOException
SerializationException

Returns the MIME type of the data read and written by this serializer.
